attributes.action: require the Home Secretary, Jacqui Smith to demonstrate a taser being used on herself before its widespread use in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Home Office has announced plans to deploy 10,000 additional tasers in the UK police force, despite legitmate concerns about their safety.

In many US police forces, the officers train by using tasers on themselves prior to being allowed to use them on the public.

In light of this, we expect that the Home Secretary should also publicly undergo a taser test to demonstrate her confidence in the system.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
